scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json addresses.mustache > src/mappings/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare:matic: mustache config/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/matic.json addresses.mustache > src/mappings/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare:bsc: mustache config/bsc.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/bsc.json addresses.mustache > src/mappings/addresses.ts
scripts.prepare:kovan: mustache config/kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/kovan.json addresses.mustache > src/mappings/addresses.ts
scripts.deploy: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy itsib/plasmaswap-v2 --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:matic: npm run prepare:matic && graph deploy itsib/plasmaswap-poligon --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:bsc: npm run prepare:bsc && graph deploy itsib/plasmaswap-bsc --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:kovan: npm run prepare:kovan && graph deploy itsib/plasmaswap --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:local: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy itsib/plasmaswap --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
